name: Chicken Penne with Mushrooms and Cream
source_file: Chicken Penne with Mushrooms and Cream.txt
description: Creamy pasta with chicken, mushrooms, tomatoes, and white wine.
instructions: Add chicken and cook over medium heat for 3 minutes.
Add mushrooms and cook another 2 minutes.
Add tomato and tomato paste and stir until combined.
Stir in wine and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until liquid is reduced by half.
Stir in the cream and salt and pepper to taste, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until sauce begins to thicken.
While sauce is cooking, cook penne in a large pan of rapidly boiling salted water until al dente. Drain well and return to pan.
Add sauce to pasta and toss. Serve immediately, sprinkled with Parmesan.
notes: Recipe text may be incomplete - missing initial ingredient quantities.
